mapper.select: select * from user where email=#{email} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into user (email, name, password, postcode,address,extra_address,bank_name,bank_account, is_developer,phone_number,profile,introduction) values (#{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{postcode},#{address},#{extraAddress},#{bankName},#{bankAccount}, #{isDeveloper},#{phoneNumber},#{profile},#{introduction})
